entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
